description:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can
see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity
saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains
no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spell's
level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8)
increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th
II
